      name - the name of the stock
      quantity - the quantity of shares
      price - the price per share

  • Method Details

    • calculateInitialBookValue

      protected double calculateInitialBookValue(int quantity, double price)
      Calculates the initial book value of the stock, including a commission fee.
      Overrides:
      calculateInitialBookValue in class Investment
      Parameters:
      quantity - the quantity of shares
      price - the price per share
      Returns:
      the initial book value including the commission fee

    • buy

      public void buy(int additionalQuantity, double price)
      Buys additional shares of the stock. The book value is increased based on the quantity and price of the new purchase, plus a commission fee.
      Specified by:
      buy in class Investment
      Parameters:
      additionalQuantity - the quantity to buy
      price - the price per share

    • sell

      public double sell(int quantityToSell, double price)
      Sells a specified quantity of shares of the stock. A commission fee is subtracted from the proceeds of the sale.
      Specified by:
      sell in class Investment
      Parameters:
      quantityToSell - the quantity to sell
      price - the price per share
      Returns:
      the proceeds from the sale after deducting the commission fee
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the quantity to sell is greater than the available quantity

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the stock, including its symbol, name, quantity, price, and book value.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Investment
      Returns:
